sentences.sentence: She put all her energies into her work.
sentences.translation: 她把全部精力都投入到工作中去了。

sentences.sentence: He devoted his energies to the reformation of science.
sentences.translation: 他把他的全部精力投入到了科学的革新中。

sentences.sentence: Their energies were focused on the alleviation of the refugees' misery.
sentences.translation: 他们把精力集中在了对难民苦难的减轻上。
